subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The similarities between the Nos. 1 and 2 teams in the B.C.S. standings are no accident: the teams’ head coaches worked together for five years at Louisiana State.
snippet: The similarities between the Nos. 1 and 2 teams in the B.C.S. standings are no accident: the teams’ head coaches worked together for five years at Louisiana State.
